description:
Details pursuant to conditions 6, 9, 10a and 11 of planning permission 2021/5985/P granted 26/09/2022 for 'Erection of single storey side and part single/part two storey rear extensions; provision of timber fenced enclosure on side yard to house bins; external alterations including new doors in side elevations, installation of air source heat pumps and condensers and associated ductwork and fans on roof', vis:

Condition 6 - Green roof
Condition 9 - Odour abatement/extract duct
Condition 10a - Bricks and mortar details of walls of extension
Condition 11 - Hard and soft landscaping/means of enclosure
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
